overview: Naktan, who loves to take photos, has taken up a job for a travel agency, to take photos for their travel magazines. During his photo taking, he finds a riddle soul, from a 20 years old film, appearing in his picture. After this, he meets many horrifying things which stimulate his curiosity to search for the truth. In his horror, he realizes that Tost, an owner of the old film, has cruelly murdered a woman…
title: Shutter One
